about_the_game:
Sundowner is a PvP survival game. Start on an island with limited resources and gather up the basic resources for survival. While you are doing that, the others on the island are doing the same, so watch out, arm yourself with whatever you have and defend yourself from the other players!

Main Features

  • Procedural island generation
  • Progression through crafting and base building
  • Realism-based bullet mechanics and features
  • Physically-based tools, body, and weapons
  • Play against 20 other players on official and any amount of players on community-hosted servers

Just a little note down here, the screenshots will update as I develop the game, so the first one will always be the most up-to-date image.

content_descriptors.notes: There is PvP, so you are fighting and killing other players. It would be more in the realm of cartoon violence, as the game doesn't have a realistic style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480, or any equivalent or better card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: This is just an estimate based on SteamVR minimum specs. Your experience may be different. Use other VR games as a good guess on how your system will perform.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern CPU with at least 6 cores / 12 threads (Current i5s and Ryzen 5)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5700XT, NVIDIA RTX 2070, or any equivalent or better card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is just an estimate. Your experience may be different. Use other VR games as a good guess on how your system will perform. The game is developed with a 2070, so if you have something better, it is very likely you will be able to run it well.

short_description: Sundowner is a PvP survival game. Build bases, make tools, gather resources, and craft weapons to survive against the island population.
